import serializeForm from "form-serialize"; const ShelfMain=({shelf,listBook,updateShelf})=>{ const handleupdate=(event)=> {const new1=serializeForm(event,{hash:true}) if(updateShelf){ updateShelf(new1) } console.log(event) console.log(new1) } return(

{shelf}

    {listBook .filter( (b) => b.shelf.replace(/ +/g, "").toLowerCase() === shelf.replace(/ +/g, "").toLowerCase() ) .map((book) => (
  1. handleupdate(e.target.value)}>
    {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. ))}
) } export default ShelfMain;
